sentences.en: ...a golf ball.
sentences.cn: …一个高尔夫球。

sentences.en: a ball of string
sentences.cn: 线团

sentences.en: a manager who has a lot on the ball; a student who has nothing on the ball.
sentences.cn: 一个很能干的经理；一名什么也不会的学生

sentences.en: a teacher who is really on the ball.
sentences.cn: 能干的老师

sentences.en: a tennis/golf/cricket etc ball
sentences.cn: 网球/高尔夫球/板球等

sentences.en: D'you want to go out and play ball ?
sentences.cn: 你想出去打球吗？

sentences.en: Dave pulled a back muscle and could barely kick the ball.
sentences.cn: 戴夫背部拉伤，几乎没法踢球。

sentences.en: He clouted the ball into the south stands.
sentences.cn: 他把球打到南边的看台上去。

sentences.en: He placed the ball and tried a couple of feints.
sentences.cn: 他把球放好，试着虚打了几下。

sentences.en: He saved one shot when the ball hit him on the head.
sentences.cn: 球砸中他的脑袋，从而让他化解了一次射门。

sentences.en: He spent hours throwing a tennis ball against a wall.
sentences.cn: 他好几个小时都对着一堵墙掷网球。

sentences.en: He struck the ball straight into the hospitality tents.
sentences.cn: 他将球直接打进迎宾帐篷里。

sentences.en: He teed the ball up carefully and then teed off.
sentences.cn: 他把球小心地放在球座上，然后开球。

sentences.en: He tore down the girl's photograph, and crumpled it into a ball.
sentences.cn: 他一把扯下那女孩的照片，将它揉成一团。

sentences.en: I struck the ball cleanly and my shot was on target.
sentences.cn: 我干脆利落地击球，命中了目标。

sentences.en: I went to kick the ball and I completely missed it.
sentences.cn: 我去踢球却踢了个空。

sentences.en: My hobbies are letter writing, foot-ball, music, photography, and tennis.
sentences.cn: 我的业余爱好是写信、踢足球、听音乐、玩摄影和打网球。

sentences.en: Shape the dough into balls
sentences.cn: 把面团搓成丸子。

sentences.en: The air of the ball began to hum.
sentences.cn: 舞会的气氛开始活跃起来了。

sentences.en: The ball drifted on the water.
sentences.cn: 那只皮球在水面上漂荡。

sentences.en: The ball fell straight to the feet of Klinsmann.
sentences.cn: 球直接落到了克林斯曼的脚上。

sentences.en: The ball is made of rattan — a natural fibre.
sentences.cn: 这个球是由一种天然纤维——省藤制成的。

sentences.en: The Ball was attended by the cream of Hollywood society.
sentences.cn: 好莱坞的大牌影星们出席了那个舞会。

sentences.en: This little ball of gold weighs a quarter of an ounce.
sentences.cn: 这个小金球重0.25盎司。

sentences.en: When we are fielding, the umpires keep looking at the ball.
sentences.cn: 我们防守的时候，裁判们一直看着球。

sentences.en: Your partner should then pass the ball back to you.
sentences.cn: 然后你的搭档应该将球回传给你。

phrases.tran_cn: 滚珠螺杆；滚珠丝杆；球头螺钉
（占卜用的）水晶球；预言未来的方法

phrases.phrase: have a lot (或 not much) on the ball
keep one's eye on (或 take one's eye off) the ball
phrases.tran_cn: 集中（或未能集中）注意力
成功的必备条件：关于能力、技巧或知识等成功所必要的品质

phrases.phrase: start (或 get , set) the ball rolling
the ball is in your court

trans.tran_en: a round object that is thrown, kicked, or hit in a game or sport
a round object that is thrown, kicked, or hit in a game or sport
